subject: Migrating from NetBeans to cmd line
msgSnippet: I am new to java and junit - 3 weeks. I have created an XML   message validation utility using NetBeans6.7. However, I now want to package this so that users
messageBody:
I am new to java and junit - 3 weeks. I have created an XML message validation utility using NetBeans6.7. However, I now want to package this so that users can invoke from the command line without having NetBeans installed.

A summary of my junit program from NetBeans is shown below -

package com.acme.automatedtesting;

import ...
import org.junit.After;
import org.junit.AfterClass;
import org.junit.Before;
import org.junit.BeforeClass;
import org.junit.Test;
import org.junit.runner.RunWith;
import org.junit.runners.Parameterized;
import org.junit.runners.Parameterized.Parameters;

@RunWith(value=Parameterized.class)
public class summariseTestCases {

private File fileURI;
private static String propertyFilesLoc = System.getProperty("propsLoc");

public summariseTestCases(File fileURI) {
this.fileURI = fileURI;
System.out.println("Processing... " + this.fileURI.getName());

}

@BeforeClass
public static void setUpClass() {
...
}

@AfterClass
public static void tearDownClass() throws Exception {
}


@Before
public void setUp() throws Exception {
}


@After
public void tearDown() {
}


@Parameters
public static Collection<Object[]> getFiles() throws IOException/*(String fileURI)*/ {
...
return data;

}

@Test
public void testXML() throws Exception {
validateXML v = new validateXML();
...
}
}

I have JUnit 4.8.1 on my classpath (both the junit_home and junit_home/jar file). I also have the path to my junit test case file on the classpath.

However, when I try to run from the command prompt (windows), I get errors. I have tried numerous combinations of the following 2 commands:

1)
java -cp c:\pathToJunitjar;pathToTestclass org.junit.runner.JUnitCore nameOfJunitTestFile

Error: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError

2)
java org.junit.runner.JUnitCore nameOfJunitTestFile
Error: Could not find class nameOfJunitTestFile


Can anyone provide any guidance/help/pointers/useful links on how I can resolve?

Thanks in advance.
